#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
static bool v[1000001];
static int pr[1000001];
int main(){
  int t;
  scanf("%d",&t);
  memset(v,false,sizeof(v));
  for(int i=2;i<=1000000;i++){
    pr[i]=pr[i-1];
    if(v[i])
        continue;
    pr[i]++;
    for(int j=i;j<=1000000;j+=i)
        v[j]=true;
  }
  while(t--){
    int x,y;
    scanf("%d %d",&x,&y);
    printf("%d\n",pr[y]-pr[x-1]);
  }
  return 0;
}
